commentBody:
The question is whether they TRIED to cheat, not whether it was effective. Why did Brady discard a cell phone? Regarding the 'science', a 140 slide presentation is ridiculous, even edited to a "crisp" 15 minutes it's too much. Comparing this to another team using a sticky towel, a truly minor infraction, is revealing.

Without their history, the Patriots would have more sympathy. 'Spygate' was really bad with modest consequences (coach retained, small fine relative to team's added value). Add to that their thuggish behavior last weekend, relying on homer refs looking the other way, will have me pulling for Denver tomorrow.
